subject: Basketball
Fashion and Apparel
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony has the N.B.A.’s top-selling jersey and the Knicks have the top-selling team jersey, based on N.B.A. Store sales since November.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony has the N.B.A.’s top-selling jersey and the Knicks have the top-selling team jersey, based on N.B.A. Store sales since November.
